items.content_html: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.
items.title: henrygad/makzontexteditor: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.

items.content_html: A lightweight PostgreSQL-backed task queue system with scheduling, retries, backoff strategies, and priority handling. Designed for efficiency and observability in modern Node.js applications.
items.title: papirosko/tasks_queue: A lightweight PostgreSQL-backed task queue system with scheduling, retries, backoff strategies, and priority handling. Designed for efficiency and observability in modern Node.js applications.

items.content_html: An open-source, lightweight, agent-based system performance monitor with remote telemetry, zero bloat, and instant deploy. Built for developers, sysadmins, and performance nerds.
items.title: LoayGhreep/SySpectrum: An open-source, lightweight, agent-based system performance monitor with remote telemetry, zero bloat, and instant deploy. Built for developers, sysadmins, and performance nerds.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.
items.title: fvena/consoleUI: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.
items.title: Johan4954/SubProbe: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: Zodest is a lightweight framework designed for building scalable web applications with ease. It simplifies the development process by providing intuitive tools and a clear structure, allowing developers to focus on creating high-quality features.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js application that allows service providers to generate instant invoices linked to QR codes. Clients can scan the QR code to view invoice details and proceed to payment. Optimized for mobile use and easy deployment.
items.title: NateJ-coder/qr-invoice-app: A lightweight Node.js application that allows service providers to generate instant invoices linked to QR codes. Clients can scan the QR code to view invoice details and proceed to payment. Optimized for mobile use and easy deployment.
